verses.verse: The man <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> Eve <S%H2332><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%> She conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and gave birth <S%H3205><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I have gotten <S%H7069><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s help."

Again <S%H3254><s%> she gave birth, <S%H3205><s%> to Cain <S%H251><s%>'s brother Abel. <S%H1893><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> was a keeper <S%H7462><s%> of sheep, <S%H6629><s%> but Cain <S%H7014><s%> was a tiller <S%H5647><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

As time <S%H3117><s%> passed, <S%H7093><s%> it happened that Cain <S%H7014><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>

Abel <S%H1893><s%> also brought <S%H935><s%> some of the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%> and of its fat. <S%H2459><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> respected <S%H8159><s%> Abel <S%H1893><s%> and his offering, <S%H4503><s%>

but he didn't <S%H7014><s%> respect Cain and his offering. <S%H4503><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry, <S%H2734><s%> and the expression on his face <S%H6440><s%> fell. <S%H5307><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> "Why are you angry? <S%H2734><s%> Why has the expression of your face <S%H6440><s%> fallen? <S%H5307><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> you do well, <S%H3190><s%> will it not be lifted <S%H7613><s%> up? <S%H3190><s%> If you don't do well, sin <S%H2403><s%> crouches <S%H7257><s%> at the door. <S%H6607><s%> Its desire <S%H8669><s%> is for you, <S%H4910><s%> but you are to rule over it."

Cain <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Abel, <S%H1893><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> "Let <S%H7704><s%>'s go into the field." It happened when they were in the field, that Cain <S%H7014><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Abel, <S%H1893><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and killed him. <S%H2026><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Cain, <S%H7014><s%> "Where <S%H335><s%> is Abel, <S%H1893><s%> your brother? <S%H251><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "I don't <S%H3045><s%> know. Am I my brother <S%H251><s%>'s keeper?"

Yahweh said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> have you done? <S%H6213><s%> The voice <S%H6963><s%> of your brother <S%H251><s%>'s blood <S%H1818><s%> cries <S%H6817><s%> to me from the ground. <S%H127><s%>

Now you are cursed <S%H779><s%> because of the ground, <S%H127><s%> which has opened <S%H6475><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>'s blood <S%H1818><s%> from your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

From now on, <S%H3588><s%> when you till <S%H5647><s%> the ground, <S%H127><s%> it won't <S%H3254><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> its strength <S%H3581><s%> to you. <S%H5128><s%> You shall be a fugitive and a wanderer <S%H5110><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
Cain <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "My punishment <S%H5771><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> than I can bear. <S%H5375><s%>

Behold, <S%H1644><s%> you have driven me out this day <S%H3117><s%> from the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground. <S%H5641><s%> I will be hidden from <S%H5921><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> and I will be a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> and a wanderer <S%H5110><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%> It will happen <S%H1961><s%> that whoever finds me <S%H4672><s%> will kill me. <S%H2026><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3651><s%> "Therefore whoever slays <S%H2026><s%> Cain, <S%H7014><s%> vengeance will be taken <S%H5358><s%> on him sevenfold. <S%H7659><s%>" Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> for Cain, <S%H7014><s%> lest <S%H1115><s%> any finding <S%H4672><s%> him should strike him. <S%H5221><s%>

Cain <S%H7014><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s presence, <S%H6440><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Nod, <S%H5113><s%> east <S%H6926><s%> of Eden. <S%H5731><s%>

Cain <S%H7014><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%> She conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and gave birth <S%H3205><s%> to Enoch. <S%H2585><s%> He built <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son, <S%H1121><s%> Enoch. <S%H2585><s%>

To Enoch <S%H2585><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> Irad. <S%H5897><s%> Irad <S%H5897><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father of Mehujael. <S%H4232><s%> Mehujael <S%H4232><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father of Methushael. <S%H4967><s%> Methushael <S%H4967><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father of Lamech. <S%H3929><s%>

Lamech <S%H3929><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wives: <S%H802><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Adah, <S%H5711><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Zillah. <S%H6741><s%>
Adah <S%H5711><s%> gave birth <S%H3205><s%> to Jabal, <S%H2989><s%> who was the father <S%H1><s%> of those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%> and have livestock. <S%H4735><s%>
His brother <S%H251><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Jubal, <S%H3106><s%> who was the father <S%H1><s%> of all who handle <S%H8610><s%> the harp <S%H3658><s%> and pipe. <S%H5748><s%>

Zillah <S%H6741><s%> also gave birth <S%H3205><s%> to Tubal <S%H8423><s%> Cain, <S%H3913><s%> the forger of every cutting instrument <S%H2794><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron. <S%H1270><s%> Tubal <S%H8423><s%> Cain <S%H269><s%>'s sister was Naamah. <S%H5279><s%>

Lamech <S%H3929><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his wives, <S%H802><s%> "Adah <S%H5711><s%> and Zillah, <S%H6741><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%> You wives <S%H802><s%> of Lamech, <S%H3929><s%> listen <S%H238><s%> to my speech, <S%H565><s%> for I have slain <S%H2026><s%> a man <S%H3206><s%> for wounding <S%H6482><s%> me, <S%H3206><s%> a young man for bruising me. <S%H2250><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> Cain <S%H7014><s%> will be avenged <S%H5358><s%> seven <S%H7659><s%> times, <S%H3929><s%> truly Lamech seventy-seven <S%H7657><s%> times. <S%H7651><s%>"

Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> again. <S%H5750><s%> She gave birth <S%H3205><s%> to a son, <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H7121><s%> named <S%H8034><s%> him Seth, <S%H8352><s%> "for God <S%H430><s%> has appointed <S%H7896><s%> me another <S%H312><s%> child <S%H2233><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Abel, <S%H1893><s%> for Cain <S%H7014><s%> killed him. <S%H2026><s%>"

There was also born <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to Seth, <S%H8352><s%> and he named <S%H8034><s%> him Enosh. <S%H583><s%> Then men <S%H2490><s%> began to call <S%H7121><s%> on Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s name. <S%H8034><s%>
